name: Car Insurance

descriptionBM: Bandingkan insurans kereta di Malaysia. Cari kadar terbaik dari Etiqa, Allianz, Tokio Marine dan lain-lain.

name: Motorcycle Insurance
description: Compare motorcycle insurance rates in Malaysia. Comprehensive and third-party coverage options.
descriptionBM: Bandingkan kadar insurans motosikal di Malaysia.

name: Health Insurance
description: Find the best health insurance and medical cards in Malaysia. Compare plans from top providers.
descriptionBM: Cari insurans kesihatan dan medical card terbaik di Malaysia.

name: Life Insurance
description: Compare life insurance plans in Malaysia. Term life, whole life, and investment-linked plans.
descriptionBM: Bandingkan pelan insurans nyawa di Malaysia.

name: Travel Insurance
description: Get the best travel insurance for your trip. Compare coverage and prices for international and domestic travel.
descriptionBM: Dapatkan insurans perjalanan terbaik untuk percutian anda.

name: Home Insurance
description: Protect your home with the right insurance. Compare fire insurance and houseowner policies in Malaysia.

name: Personal Accident Insurance
description: Personal accident insurance in Malaysia. Coverage for accidental death, disability, and medical expenses.
